job description:
Position: Data Engineer

Location: San Jose, CA

JD: Requirements for Contact Center Business Intelligence Analyst

Responsibilities:
  • Work closely with IT business partners and business analysts to understand their data needs and develop reporting solutions to meet those needs.
  • Work with Engineering partners to help shape and drive the development of Client BI infrastructure including data warehousing, reporting and analytics solutions.
  • Own and deliver multiple BI work streams for diverse internal clients, both on an ongoing and ad-hoc basis, providing interpretation, analysis, or insight along with clearly-stated information, representing interests of both team and leadership.
  • Create dashboards, visualizations, and analyses that surface insights and drive key business decisions.
  • Using internal Client tools, build new data pipelines from new sources, and maintain existing pipelines. Respond to and resolve pipeline failures.
  • Respond to questions from internal client teams, train new users on telephony data warehouse principles.
  • Maintain playbook, user guide and other data related documentation.
Minimum Qualifications:
  • BA/BS degree with quantitative focus or equivalent practical experience
  • Minimum 5 years working with SQL, query optimization, working with large datasets and schemas, scripting, regular expression building.
  • Minimum of 3 years of proven familiarity with data mining, analysis, and visualization; experience in manipulating and curating large, complex data from a variety of systems and creating visualizations that surface business insights.
  • Distinctive problem-solving and analytical skills combined with superb communication skills; demonstrated ability to convey complex concepts and solutions to all levels of an organization.
Preferred Qualifications:
  • Data warehousing experience (e.g. storage methods/formats, database design, usage).
  • Experience with Extraction Transformation Load (ETL) optimization and applying business logic to data
  • Strong competency working in web-based tools including Client Sheets and Apps Script.
  • Genuine excitement and passion for developing and analyzing large, complex data sets and converting them into the information / insights that drive business decisions at all levels of the organization.
  • Knowledge of CRM tools, customer support applications and call center processes and data is a plus.
  • Familiarity working in a UNIX environment and with version control systems.
